Dashboard Settings Appearance Theme System Light Dark Dynamic color Shopping & Display Ad Blocking Advanced Debug logs Choose light, dark, or system default Use Material You colors from wallpaper Remove ads Inject CSS rules into Amazon app to hide ads and sponsored junk Price history charts Show Keepa and CamelCamelCamel charts on product pages Dark mode (experimental) Apply dark mode to Amazon pages. Requires force stopping Amazon to take effect WebView debugging Attach DevTools to Amazon WebViews. Requires force stopping Amazon to take effect Write verbose hook and injection logs.
